name: web-archiving-tool
description: A web archiving tool similar to Wayback Machine

scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:backend -- --coverage && npm run test:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.clean: npm run clean:frontend && npm run clean:backend
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && rm -rf node_modules frontend/node_modules backend/node_modules
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:backend -- --fix && npm run lint:frontend -- --fix
scripts.format: npm run format:backend && npm run format:frontend
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck:backend && npm run typecheck:frontend
